p: Regarding acylglycerols, these were only described in the aqueous extract of A. donax [ 43]; in total, 11 compounds were reported ( Table S1). Acylglycerols serve as storage of lipids and are of great nutritional value, being a common source of edible oils for alimentation and industrial purposes [ 79]. Furthermore, monoacylglycerols seem to be overexpressed in salt stress conditions [ 80].
